author: parithosh
content:
Would be nice if we actually talk about this at devcon and decide on which approach we're gonna stick to for the future. I'm mostly fine with either approach and personally think no feature will guaranteed make it on mainnet until the slot after the fork has occured. 

I personally don't think we have the dev capacity overall to focus on so many things at once, but that might ofc just be my view. e.g: last fork had the full attention of everyone in the team vs this fork we've had to strategically split resources to make sure each feature gets someone working on it. Downside of this approach, fewer eyes on each feature and more corners being cut - Upside, more short term progress on each individual feature.
